description_for_human: An intelligent Wordle puzzle solver that analyzes letter frequencies and suggests optimal guesses based on feedback. Helps you solve Wordle puzzles by filtering candidate words and providing scored suggestions.
description_for_model: A Wordle solver tool that processes feedback (green/yellow/grey letters) and returns filtered candidate words with scored suggestions. Use this when users need help solving Wordle puzzles. The tool accepts a guess word, green letters (correct position), yellow letters (wrong position), and grey letters (not in word), then returns candidate words and scored suggestions.
